meanings.definition: The act of renouncing or rejecting something.
meanings.sent1: Her renunciation of sweets helped her stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The renunciation of his inheritance surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: His renunciation of dessert left his friends puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The renunciation of his former lifestyle was a turning point for him.
meanings.sent5: The renunciation of his bad habits was a difficult but necessary step.

meanings.definition: A formal declaration of giving up a claim or right.
meanings.sent1: The renunciation of his claim to the throne was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The renunciation of her citizenship was a serious decision.
meanings.sent3: His renunciation of the last piece of cake caused a stir.
meanings.sent4: The renunciation of his leadership position shocked the team.
meanings.sent5: The renunciation of his title marked the end of an era.

meanings.definition: The act of abstaining or refraining from something.
meanings.sent1: His renunciation of alcohol was a personal choice.
meanings.sent2: The renunciation of meat for Lent was a common practice.
meanings.sent3: Her renunciation of social media for a week was challenging.
meanings.sent4: The renunciation of technology during the retreat was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The renunciation of gossip helped create a more positive environment.
